'''Compassion Illuminated''' is [[Nahida]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* [[Fallen Character|Fallen]] party members can not be selected as the character with the highest Elemental Mastery.
** If the selected party member is defeated while the Shrine of Maya is active, their Elemental Mastery will continue to be used by this passive until it expires.
